description.oldValue: With "Share an Update", leaders can share updates of their team goals to the members of their organization directly from Viva Goals. Updates are sent to users via email.
description.newValue: With "Share an Update," leaders can share updates of their team goals to the members of their organization directly from Viva Goals. Updates are sent to users via email.
